title: First Coffee Date
description: We met at that little coffee shop downtown. You ordered a caramel latte and I knew I was in trouble when you smiled.

title: Our First Kiss
description: Under the cherry blossoms in the park. It was perfect timing, just like everything else about us.

title: Made It Official
description: The day you said yes to being my girlfriend. I was so nervous, but your smile made everything perfect.

title: First 'I Love You'
description: During our movie night. You whispered it during the credits, and my heart nearly exploded with happiness.

title: Weekend Getaway
description: Our first trip together to the beach. Sunsets, long walks, and falling even more in love with you.

title: Meeting Your Family
description: The day I met your parents. Your mom made the best apple pie, and your dad told the funniest stories.

title: Halloween Costume Contest
description: We dressed up as superheroes and won first place! You looked absolutely amazing in your costume.

title: First Christmas Together
description: Exchanging gifts by the fireplace. The sweater you knitted me is still my favorite thing to wear.
